articles.author: Natasha Bertrand, Oren Liebermann, CNN staff
articles.title: Russia undermining relationship of critical West African ally with the US, officials say - CNN
articles.description: A critical US partner in northwest Africa is turning toward Russia, amid warnings from the top US commander in the continent that the Russians are trying to “take over” the entire Sahel region of Africa.
articles.content: A critical US partner in northwest Africa is turning toward Russia amid warnings from the top US commander in the continent that the Russians are trying to take over the entire Sahel region of Africa… [+7267 chars]
